review: So far no complaints, easy set up easy to use great  investment
author: ronnie

review: So far so good Still learning how to use it.
author: LUCILLE

review: Easier than pie. Came pre-loaded with all my prime content and set up was less than 5 minutes and go!!  still have my TiVo for cable and Netflix but I can switch over to fire tv with the click of a button for its prime content and all the other content not available on Netflix.  Amazing quality.  Very happy.
author: jude

review: smart TV without buying a new  set. none of the delays mentioned in reviews
author: Amazon Customer

review: Amazon fire TV sucks ,thank god for the free 30 day free trial.Any movie my kids want  to see cost money.What a waste buying the box!
author: Brad Walter

review: Easy set up, fast deliverary. Had some trouble with one month free trial for Amazon prime subscription.Very user friendly.
author: Hawaiigirl

review: Love it. Just retired and will be using it much more. Use it during my indoor running helps pass the time.
author: Bev

review: Better than I could have hoped. He loves it and so do I.
author: Karole Miller

review: Does what is says and more thanks CJ...........
author: CLINTON JONES

review: Would not let me install Netflix! I tried the Fire TV forum with no luck and looked for a way to contact Amazon for assistance, once again no luck! Sent this back and ordered another Roku 3 since it works with no problem and has no problem letting me install Netflix,
author: Amazonfan
